distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libvpx fixes one issues.

This security issue was fixed: 

- CVE-2017-13194: Fixed incorrect memory allocation related to odd frame width (bsc#1075992).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A vulnerability in the Android media framework (libvpx) related to odd frame width. Product: Android. Versions: 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-64710201.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
